resources.string: Count the toes, which are not folded and press the corresponding button.
Find the shadow of the figure and press it.
One of the four pictures does not fit the others. Find it and press it.
Find the three identical buttons. Press them and after that press the "check" button.(You don not have a chance for undo if a button is pressed.)
Count the toes, which ARE folded and press the corresponding button.
Arrange the pieces of the figure by numbers bottom up.
Arrange the pieces of the figure by numbers bottom up.
Remember the pictures that will be displayed on the next page. After 30 seconds will be shown another page. Click on the pictures you remember.
What is the time? Choose the correct answer.
The two images on the left have a relation. Find one of the couples on the right, which two pictures have the same relation.
Find the number, which is hidden among the intertwined lines and choose the correct answer.
Find all the squares and click the corresponding number..
Follow the unfinished rows of digits and guess what is the next one.
What picture from the board corresponds to the picture below? Choose the corresponding number.(See the example below)
For the construction of a cube requires 8(eight) bricks. How many bricks must be added to complete cubes.
How many blocks includes in the figure. Press the corresponding button
Click on the group of three digits in which the middle digit is lower than the other two, and skip all other groups.
EN Приложението \"БГ ученик\" е сбор от упражнения за деца в предучилищна възраст , които развиват всички основни познавателни способности - мислене, внимание, памет, въображение, и др.\n
